contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of August, 2011, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122 (defendant is entitled to a counsel-filed Petition for Allowance of Appeal on direct appeal). Counsel shall file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 15 days of this order.
